actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of State to prescribe the fee for execution of an application for a passport and to continue to transfer to the U.S. Postal Service the execution fee for each application accepted by that Service.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of State to prescribe the fee for execution of an application for a passport. Provides for the continued transfer to the United States Postal Service of the execution fee for each application accepted by that Service. (Amends 22 U.S.C. 214).

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of State to prescribe the fee for execution of an application for a passport and to continue to transfer to the U.S. Postal Service the execution fee for each application accepted by that Service.
